item.title: ILIAD Tools
item.description: A toolkit for controlling sound parameters in real-time using…images!

item.title: Img2LaTeX
item.description: An end-to-end model for converting handwritten mathematical expressions to compilable LaTeX code.

item.title: Task-specific ontology modelling
item.description: A flask chatbot developed from a curated ontology of the Airbnb dataset for easier search and of requested listings.

item.title: swaad
item.description: An AI based effort to reduce food wastage from households by incorporating the leftovers into delicious recipes!
